title: Absolutely confused lineup
body:
For just one round, my champion lineup was completely bonkers.  Only 4/5 slots spawned with any option (the 5th was blank from the start).  I clicked on rengar and got a Vayne??  I clicked on Vayne and got a braum?  One of the others simply refused to let me buy it at all.

Something fundamentally broke for just that round, because it was entirely normal after that.

replies.body: I've seen this on multiple occasions.
